description: An organism from which a sample or test result is available

rdfs:label.description: A human-readable name for the entity.

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the JSON Schema that defines this object.

TerraCore:hasBioSample.title: has BioSample
TerraCore:hasBioSample.description: This property references the BioSample donated by the Donor.

TerraCore:hasOrganismType.title: hasOrganismType
TerraCore:hasOrganismType.comment: For example: Homo sapiens from obo:NCBITaxon_9606
TerraCore:hasOrganismType.description: A reference to the organism type.

TerraCore:hasPhenotypicSex.title: hasPhenotypicSex
TerraCore:hasPhenotypicSex.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex of the Donor organism.

TerraCore:hasSexAssignedAtBirth.title: hasSexAssignedAtBirth
TerraCore:hasSexAssignedAtBirth.description: A reference to the BiologicalSex assigned to the donor organism at birth by a medical professional.

TerraCore:hasAge.title: hasAge
TerraCore:hasAge.description: A reference to the Age of the Donor at the point in time that data was collected or that the BioSample was obtained.

TerraCore:hasGenotypicSex.title: hasPhenotypicSex
TerraCore:hasGenotypicSex.description: A biological sex quality inhering in an individual based upon genotypic composition of sex chromosomes. [PATO]

title: Donor
